#summary How to check-out the Piccolo 2D code from Subversion

----

|| *Links:* || [http://code.google.com/p/piccolo2d/source/browse Browse Repository] || [http://code.google.com/p/piccolo2d/source/list View Recent Changes] ||

----

=== Command-Line Access ===

==== Developers (read/write) ====

If you plan to make changes, use the following commands to check out the code as yourself using HTTPS:

|| Piccolo 2D Java: || svn checkout _*https*_://piccolo2d.googlecode.com/svn/*piccolo2d.java*/trunk/ *piccolo2d.java* --username _your@user.name_ ||
|| Piccolo 2D .NET: || svn checkout _*https*_://piccolo2d.googlecode.com/svn/*piccolo2d.net*/trunk/ *piccolo2d.net* --username _your@user.name_ ||
|| PocketPiccolo 2D: || svn checkout _*https*_://piccolo2d.googlecode.com/svn/*pocketpiccolo2d.net*/trunk/ *pocketpiccolo2d.net* --username _your@user.name_ ||

_When prompted, enter your generated [http://code.google.com/hosting/settings googlecode.com] password._

==== Viewers (read-only) ====

Use the following commands to anonymously check out the latest project source code:

|| Piccolo 2D Java: || svn checkout _*http*_://piccolo2d.googlecode.com/svn/*piccolo2d.java*/trunk/ piccolo2d.java-read-only ||
|| Piccolo 2D .NET: || svn checkout _*http*_://piccolo2d.googlecode.com/svn/*piccolo2d.net*/trunk/ *piccolo2d.net-read-only* ||
|| PocketPiccolo 2D: || svn checkout _*http*_://piccolo2d.googlecode.com/svn/*pocketpiccolo2d.net*/trunk/ *pocketpiccolo2d.net-read-only* ||

 

=== GUI and IDE Access ===

This project's Subversion repository may be accessed using many different [http://subversion.tigris.org/links.html#clients client programs and plug-ins]. See your client's documentation for more information.
